name: 33Seconds Ltd
tag_list: social-media-marketing, pr, communications, technology, social-space, innovators, entrepreneurs, start-ups
description: Social Media Marketing & Social Tech PR
overview:
33Seconds is a specialist agency offering social media marketing and social technology PR.

We provide Social Media Marketing to brands, organisations and content owners and PR & Comms to social technology companies & innovators; this deep immersion in the social space provides our clients with invaluable insights and unique opportunities.

For brands, organisations and content owners: With more meaningful social media experience than anyone in Europe, 33Seconds devises and implements audience acquisition strategies using earned & paid social media marketing, advocacy programs and seeding. We deliver responsible and effective audience engagement, real-time conversation monitoring, customer service and issues management.

For technology companies & innovators in the social space: With more than 12 years of broadcast and social technology PR & comms experience (MySpace, BBC, SoundCloud, Joost), 33Seconds devises and implements communication strategies that best underpin business objectives. We determine the most effective ways to communicate to key stakeholders, using product, consumer and trade PR; media, blogger and analyst relations, social media management; speaker programs; award entries; reputation and crisis management.
